# Under construction
Feel free to take a look at my current projects on [my Github] (https://github.com/Chive):
* [Pyrate] (https://github.com/Chive/pyrate) is a python wrapper for restful web apis. It's like _magic_ but simpler.
* A collection of various [python scripts] (https://github.com/Chive/python-scripts).

Or visit my portfolio here: [smuzey.ch] (https://smuzey.ch)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
